Returns: a string representation for this MathContext instance
toString().Description: Returns the string representation for this MathContext instance. The string has the form "precision=<precision> roundingMode=<roundingMode>" where <precision> is an integer describing the number of digits used for operations and <roundingMode> is the string representation of the rounding mode.

Throws: if the string is not in the correct format or if the precision specified is < 0.
MathContext(java.lang.String).Description: Constructs a new MathContext from a string. The string has to specify the precision and the rounding mode to be used and has to follow the following syntax: "precision=<precision> roundingMode=<roundingMode>" This is the same form as the one returned by the @B_java#math#MathContext#toString_E@ method.

getPrecision().Description: Returns the precision. The precision is the number of digits used for an operation. Results are rounded to this precision. The precision is guaranteed to be non negative. If the precision is zero, then the computations have to be performed exact, results are not rounded in this case.

getRoundingMode().Description: Returns the rounding mode. The rounding mode is the strategy to be used to round results. The rounding mode is one of @B_java#math#RoundingMode#UP_E@, @B_java#math#RoundingMode#DOWN_E@, @B_java#math#RoundingMode#CEILING_E@, @B_java#math#RoundingMode#FLOOR_E@, @B_java#math#RoundingMode#HALF_UP_E@, @B_java#math#RoundingMode#HALF_DOWN_E@, @B_java#math#RoundingMode#HALF_EVEN_E@, or @B_java#math#RoundingMode#UNNECESSARY_E@.

Parameters: int: the precision for the new MathContext.
RoundingMode: the rounding mode for the new MathContext.
MathContext(int, java.math.RoundingMode).Description: Constructs a new MathContext with the specified precision and with the specified rounding mode. If the precision passed is zero, then this implies that the computations have to be performed exact, the rounding mode in this case is irrelevant.

Parameters: int: the precision for the new MathContext.
RoundingMode: the rounding mode for the new MathContext.
MathContext(int,java.math.RoundingMode).Description: Constructs a new MathContext with the specified precision and with the specified rounding mode. If the precision passed is zero, then this implies that the computations have to be performed exact, the rounding mode in this case is irrelevant.

Parameters: int: the precision for the new MathContext.
MathContext(int).Description: Constructs a new MathContext with the specified precision and with the rounding mode @B_java#math#RoundingMode#HALF_UP_E@. If the precision passed is zero, then this implies that the computations have to be performed exact, the rounding mode in this case is irrelevant.

Returns: true if this MathContext instance is equal to the x argument; false otherwise.
equals(java.lang.Object).Description: Returns true if x is a MathContext with the same precision setting and the same rounding mode as this MathContext instance.

Returns: the hash code for this MathContext.
hashCode().Description: Returns the hash code for this MathContext instance.

ClassDesc: Immutable objects describing settings such as rounding mode and digit precision for the numerical operations provided by class @B_java#math#BigDecimal_E@.
